note: AIBS publishes, with Wisdom Publications, important translations and scholarly studies of Indian and Tibetan Buddhism along with relevant topics. Its two primary series are Treasury of the Buddhist Sciences and Treasury of the Indic Sciences. Editor-in-Chief is Robert A.F. Thurman, Jey Tsong Khapa Professor Emeritus of Indo-Tibetan Buddhist Studies, President of Tibet House US, and Padma Shri award recipient. Executive Editor is Thomas F. Yarnall, Ph.D., Associate Reseach Scholar at Columbia U.
